translations.Aprende inglés con nuestros diferentes n: Learn English with our different levels and proposals for all ages.

translations.Preparación para International English L: Preparation for International English Language Testing System
translations.Inglés para negocios y entornos profesio: English for business and professional environments
translations.Resolvemos tus dudas sobre nuestras clas: We resolve your doubts about our English classes
translations.El ciclo lectivo 2025 comenzó el 17 de m: The 2025 school year began on March 17, but registration is open until April 4.
translations.No para el nivel Beginner. Para los otro: Not for the Beginner level. For the other levels, we carry out an evaluation to place you in the appropriate group according to your knowledge.
translations.¿Cuál es el costo de las clases?: What is the cost of the classes?
translations.Los costos varían según el nivel y si er: Costs vary depending on the level and whether you are a member or not. Contact us for detailed information on current prices.
translations.El material didáctico básico está inclui: The basic teaching material is included. We will indicate if you need any additional book or resource according to the level.
translations.Experiencias de quienes ya están aprendi: Experiences of those who are already learning English with us
translations.\"Las clases con la profesora Gladis son: "The classes with Professor Gladis are excellent. Her teaching method is very clear and dynamic. In a short time I have noticed a great improvement in my English level."
translations.\"Empecé desde cero y ahora puedo manten: "I started from scratch and now I can hold basic conversations in English. The atmosphere is very pleasant and the small groups allow personalized attention."
translations.\"Mi hijo disfruta mucho las clases de i: "My son really enjoys English classes. Professor Gladis has a very special way of teaching children, making them learn by playing."
Don't miss this opportunity and join now. Registration open until April 4.
translations.Descubre todo lo que el Círculo Italiano: Discover everything that the Italian Circle of Miramar has to offer
translations.Aprende italiano e inglés con nuestros d: Learn Italian and English with our different levels and proposals for all ages.
translations.Exposiciones, muestras, charlas y evento: Exhibitions, shows, talks and events that promote Italian culture.
translations.Asesoramiento y apoyo en los trámites pa: Advice and support in the procedures to obtain Italian citizenship.
translations.Desde 1889, somos un pilar de la cultura: Since 1889, we have been a pillar of Italian culture in Miramar. We were born to support immigrants and today we continue to promote the language, traditions and cultural encounter. With 136 years of history, we have evolved while maintaining our Italian heart.
translations.¿Quieres formar parte?: Do you want to be part of it?
translations.Acércate a nuestra sede o contáctanos pa: Come to our headquarters or contact us to learn more about our activities, become a member or present your project.
translations.Espacios ideales para sus eventos social: Ideal spaces for your social, corporate and cultural events
translations.Rellene el formulario de contacto para r: Fill out the contact form to reserve one of our halls.
translations.Si necesita alquilar uno de nuestros ele: If you need to rent one of our elegant halls for your event or celebration, contact our team. We offer personalized advice to make your event an unforgettable moment.
translations.Salón principal del Círculo Italiano: Main hall of the Italian Circle
translations.Ubicación privilegiada en el corazón de: Privileged location in the heart of Miramar
translations.Ambiente de elegancia y tradición italia: Atmosphere of elegance and Italian tradition
translations.¿Qué salón te interesa alquilar? *: Which hall are you interested in renting? *
translations.Describe tu evento, fecha deseada, servi: Describe your event, desired date, additional services you need...
translations.Nos pondremos en contacto contigo pronto: We will contact you soon to confirm the details of your reservation.
translations.También nos puede contactar de Lunes a V: You can also contact us from Monday to Friday from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.
translations.Nuestro salón principal es perfecto para: Our main hall is perfect for large events such as weddings, conferences and galas. With large windows that provide natural light and views of the city.
translations.Un espacio íntimo y elegante ideal para: An intimate and elegant space ideal for medium-sized events such as birthdays, family reunions and corporate meetings.
translations.¿Cómo puedo reservar un salón?: How can I reserve a hall?
translations.Puede realizar una reserva completando e: You can make a reservation by completing the form on this page, calling us directly or visiting our secretariat. We recommend booking at least 2 months in advance.
translations.Contamos con una lista de proveedores de: We have a list of recommended catering providers, but you can also bring your own service. Ask about our traditional Italian menu options.
translations.¿Qué instalaciones y equipamiento incluy: What facilities and equipment are included?
translations.Nuestros salones incluyen sistema de son: Our halls include a basic sound system, projector, tables and chairs. For an additional cost you can request special lighting, decoration and advanced audiovisual equipment.
translations.Consejo Directivo del Círculo Italiano: Board of Directors of the Italian Circle

translations.Miembros del Consejo Directivo: Members of the Board of Directors
translations.Aprende italiano y vive la dolce vita co: Learn Italian and live the dolce vita with our different levels and proposals for all ages.
translations.También ofrecemos clases especiales para: We also offer special classes for children in the morning shift, with playful methodologies adapted to their age.
translations.Resolvemos tus dudas sobre nuestras clas: We resolve your doubts about our Italian classes
translations.No para el nivel Iniziale. Para los otro: Not for the Iniziale level. For the other levels, we carry out an evaluation to place you in the appropriate group according to your knowledge.
translations.¿Tienes dudas, consultas o quieres comun: Do you have questions, queries or want to communicate with the Mutual Cultural Circle Italiano Joven Italia? Complete the form and we will respond as soon as possible.
translations.Descubre todas las actividades culturale: Discover all the cultural, social and educational activities that we organize in the Italian Circle of Miramar
There are no events celebrated yet.
translations.Mantente al día con todas nuestras activ: Stay up to date with all our activities and events
translations.¿Tienes un proyecto cultural?: Do you have a cultural project?
translations.Acércanos tu propuesta. Estamos abiertos: Bring us your proposal. We are open to collaborations and new cultural initiatives.
translations.136 años acompañando a la ciudad de Mira: 136 years accompanying the city of Miramar 🇦🇷🇮🇹
translations.Revive momentos clave de nuestra trayect: Relive key moments of our trajectory.
translations.Historia del Círculo Italiano Joven Ital: History of the Italian Circle Joven Italia
translations.nuestros_origenes_p1: The history of the Italian Circle begins in the late 19th century, when groups of Italian immigrants decided to settle in a nascent Miramar. Faced with a lack of medical assistance, on April 28, 1889, these immigrants formed an Italian mutual aid society named "Joven Italia", with Felice Lucini as its first president.
translations.timelone_1889: April 28 - Foundation of the Italian mutual aid society "Joven Italia" in Miramar, under the presidency of Felice Lucini, to provide medical assistance and medicines to its members.
translations.timelone_2000: Formación de una comisión normalizadora para reactivar la sociedad de socorros mutuos "Joven Italia", que había quedado sin socios con la llegada de las obras sociales.
translations.timeline_2005: Agosto - Fusión de ambas instituciones tras una asamblea unánime, formando la "Mutual Cultural Círculo Italiano Joven Italia". Octubre - Inauguración del Salón Michelangelo. Se crea una subcomisión de cultura que comienza a organizar la semana de la cultura anual.
translations.Venta del edificio del Círculo Italiano: Sale of the Italian Circle building and start of construction of a second floor at the Joven Italia headquarters, with new classrooms and an additional hall.
translations.19 de agosto - Inauguración del salón \": August 19 - Inauguration of the "Giuseppe Verdi" hall on the second floor, completing an important stage of expansion for the institution.
translations.Celebración de los 136 años de historia,: Celebration of 136 years of history, reaffirming our commitment to promoting Italian culture in Miramar and continuing with the dreams to be fulfilled that drive our institution.
translations.Un pilar cultural para Miramar a lo larg: A cultural pillar for Miramar over the decades
translations.Desde su formación, nuestra subcomisión: Since its formation, our cultural subcommittee has worked professionally in programming annual cultural events such as the "Culture Week", providing a space where artists, groups and institutions of the city can show their talents.
translations.Hemos establecido un salón de exposicion: We have established a permanent monthly exhibition hall in our entrance hall, where talented local artists can present their works, and we regularly organize conferences, book presentations and workshops.
translations.Nuestro cóctel de moda anual, que comenz: Our annual fashion cocktail, which began as a small event, has become a flagship event of the city, featuring leading figures in the fashion world and raising funds for local institutions in need.
translations.Principios que han guiado nuestra instit: Principles that have guided our institution throughout these 136 years
translations.Fomentamos el sentido de pertenencia y l: We encourage the sense of belonging and unity among the members of the Italian and local community, from our origins as a mutual aid society to today.
translations.Preservamos y promovemos la rica cultura: We preserve and promote the rich Italian culture through exhibitions, talks, and events that enrich the cultural life of Miramar.
translations.Ofrecemos oportunidades de aprendizaje d: We offer learning opportunities of the Italian language and culture for all ages, contributing to the intellectual development of the community.
translations.Construimos puentes entre la cultura ita: We build bridges between Italian and Argentine culture, enriching both communities, as demonstrated by our successful institutional merger in 2005.
translations.Respetamos nuestras raíces mientras nos: We respect our roots while adapting to new times, as demonstrated by our evolution from a mutual aid society to an integral cultural center.
translations.Apoyamos a nuestra comunidad como lo hic: We support our community as we have done since 1889, now through charitable events such as our annual fashion cocktail that benefits local institutions.
translations.Un vistazo a nuestro pasado en imágenes: A glimpse into our past in images
translations.\"Una institución que vio nacer a una ci: "An institution that saw a city born, and a city that saw an institution grow, a pride for all Italians and for all their descendants. A dream that was distant and utopian, but that became a reality from the effort of hundreds of people who dedicated part of their lives to make it a reality. Today it is 136 years and there are many, but we still have dreams to fulfill."
translations.Te acompañamos en todo el proceso para o: We accompany you throughout the process to obtain your Italian citizenship
translations.Ofrecemos asesoramiento completo para fa: We offer complete advice to facilitate your citizenship process
translations.Te orientamos sobre los requisitos, docu: We guide you on the requirements, necessary documentation and steps to follow to start your procedure.
translations.Te ayudamos con la búsqueda, traducción: We help you with the search, translation and legalization of documents necessary for your procedure.
translations.Realizamos el seguimiento de tu trámite: We track your procedure and keep you informed about its status and next steps.
translations.Conoce los pasos para obtener tu ciudada: Learn the steps to obtain your Italian citizenship
translations.Analizamos tu caso para determinar si cu: We analyze your case to determine if you meet the requirements to apply for Italian citizenship by descent.
translations.Te ayudamos a reunir todos los documento: We help you gather all the necessary documents: birth, marriage and death certificates of your Italian ancestors.
translations.Gestionamos la traducción oficial al ita: We manage the official translation into Italian and the legalization of all required documents.
translations.Organizamos toda la documentación según: We organize all the documentation according to the requirements of the corresponding Italian consulate.
translations.Te asesoramos en la presentación de la s: We advise you on the presentation of the application and monitor it until you obtain your citizenship.
translations.Tener un antepasado italiano que haya em: Have an Italian ancestor who emigrated to Argentina after the unification of Italy (1861).
translations.Demostrar la línea de descendencia direc: Demonstrate the direct line of descent through official documentation.
translations.El antepasado italiano no debe haber ren: The Italian ancestor must not have renounced his citizenship before the birth of the next descendant in the line.
translations.Presentar partidas de nacimiento, matrim: Submit birth, marriage and death certificates of all ancestors in the line of descent.
translations.Todos los documentos deben estar legaliz: All documents must be legalized and translated into Italian by an official translator.
translations.Resolvemos tus dudas sobre el trámite de: We resolve your doubts about the Italian citizenship process
translations.¿Quiénes pueden solicitar la ciudadanía: Who can apply for Italian citizenship?
translations.Cualquier persona que pueda demostrar su: Anyone who can prove their descent from an Italian citizen, without limit of generations, as long as the line of transmission has not been interrupted.
translations.¿Cuánto tiempo toma el proceso?: How long does the process take?
translations.El tiempo varía según cada caso, pero ge: The time varies depending on each case, but it can generally take between 1 and 3 years from the submission of the application to obtaining citizenship.
translations.Necesitarás partidas de nacimiento, matr: You will need birth, marriage and death certificates of all your ancestors in the Italian line, from your Italian ancestor to you. All must be legalized and translated into Italian.
translations.¿Puedo tramitar la ciudadanía si mi ante: Can I process citizenship if my Italian ancestor became an Argentine citizen?
translations.Depende de cuándo se naturalizó. Si lo h: It depends on when he became naturalized. If he did so after the birth of the next descendant in the line, you can still apply for citizenship. If it was before, the line of transmission was interrupted.
translations.¿Qué beneficios tiene la ciudadanía ital: What are the benefits of Italian citizenship?
translations.La ciudadanía italiana te permite residi: Italian citizenship allows you to reside, work and study in any country of the European Union, travel without restrictions throughout Europe, and transmit citizenship to your descendants.
translations.Contáctanos para una evaluación gratuita: Contact us for a free evaluation of your case and begin the process towards your Italian citizenship.
translations.Clases de Inglés - Círculo Italiano Jove: English Classes - Círculo Italiano Joven Italia
translations.Aprende inglés con profesores certificad: Learn English with certified teachers. All levels available for children and adults in Miramar.

translations.Descubre el Círculo Italiano Joven Itali: Discover the Círculo Italiano Joven Italia in Miramar. Italian and English classes, cultural events, citizenship procedures and more. 136 years promoting Italian culture.
translations.Alquile nuestros elegantes salones para: Rent our elegant halls for your events and celebrations. Michael Angello Hall for 280 people and Guiseppe Verdi Hall for 90 people.
translations.Conozca a los miembros del Consejo Direc: Meet the members of the Board of Directors, Court of Honor and authorities of the Círculo Italiano de Miramar.

translations.Nuestra Historia - Círculo Italiano Jove: Our History - Círculo Italiano Joven Italia
translations.Conoce los 113635 años de historia del C: Learn about the 113635 years of history of the Círculo Italiano Joven Italia de Miramar. Since 1889 preserving and promoting Italian culture in the community.
translations.Trámites de Ciudadanía Italiana - Círcul: Italian Citizenship Procedures - Círculo Italiano Joven Italia
translations.Asesoramiento completo para obtener tu c: Complete advice to obtain your Italian citizenship. We help you with document management, translations, legalizations and monitoring of your procedure.
translations.Acompañando a la ciudad de Miramar hace: Accompanying the city of Miramar for 136 years
translations.Las clases con la profesora Gladis son e: Classes with Professor Gladis are excellent. Her teaching method is very clear and dynamic. In a short time I have noticed a great improvement in my English level.
translations.Empecé desde cero y ahora puedo mantener: I started from scratch and now I can hold basic conversations in English. The atmosphere is very pleasant and the small groups allow for personalized attention.
translations.Mi hijo disfruta mucho las clases de ing: My son really enjoys English classes. Professor Gladis has a very special way of teaching children, making them learn by playing.
translations.Una institución que vio nacer a una ciud: An institution that saw a city born, and a city that saw an institution grow, a pride for all Italians and for all their descendants. A dream that was distant and utopian, but that became a reality from the effort of hundreds of people who dedicated part of their lives to make it a reality. Today it is 136 years and there are many, but we still have dreams to fulfill.
translations.19 de agosto - Inauguración del salón Gi: August 19 - Inauguration of the Giuseppe Verdi hall on the second floor, completing an important stage of expansion for the institution.
translations.Desde su formación, nuestra subcomisión: Since its formation, our cultural subcommittee has worked professionally in programming annual cultural events such as Culture Week, providing a space where artists, groups and institutions of the city can showcase their talents.
